title: Generate Firebase Project
description: Generate a new Firebase project with emulator support, deployment targets, and proper Nx integration

name.description: The name of the Firebase project
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for your Firebase project?

tags.description: Comma-separated tags to apply to the project (in addition to automatic tags: type:firebase, scope:{name}, platform:firebase)
